fields.name: Friends Trivia Race to Central Perk Board Game
fields.description:
Put your Friends knowledge to the ultimate test with the Race to Central Perk Board Game!

Play as one of the six main characters and race to the Central Perk sofa. Don't let the curveball trivia catch you!

This hilarious party game makes the perfect night in for fans of the classic sitcom.

Product Information:
• Friends Trivia Race to Central Perk
• Board Game
• Players: 2-4
• Ages: 12+

fields.name: Now That's What I Call Music Board Game
fields.description:
Test your musical knowledge with this Now That’s What I Call Music Board Game.

There are questions on music from the 80's, 90's and 21st Century, as well as covers to sing and song titles to mime

The perfect game for amazing family fun!

Product Information:
• Now That’s What I Call Music Board Game
• Players: 2-6
• Ages: 8+

fields.name: Jumanji Board Game
fields.description:
A game for those who seek to find… a way to leave their world behind.

Stalking lions, charging rhinos, snapping crocodiles and other dangerous creatures — in the wild world of Jumanji, they're only a dice roll away! 

Grab your pawn, roll the eight-sided number dice and move through the jungle! 

Draw a danger card, then use your decoder to discover the secret message and see if disaster strikes. Your fellow players must race against time to rescue you! 

If you are the first to reach the centre before the Doomsday Grid fills up, yell Jumanji! and win!

Play the game that pursues you! Adventurers beware: do not begin unless you intend to finish.

Includes:
 • 1 x Game Board
 • Pawns
 • Rhino Figure
 • Timer
 • 1 x Number Dice 
 • 4 x Rescue Dice
 • 30 x Danger Cards 
 • Game Board Centre
 • Decoder
 • Label Sheet
 • Instructions

Product Information:
 • Board Game
 • Jumanji 
 • 2 + Players
 • Age: 5+ 
 • Box Dimensions: 37.63 x 27.62 x 5.88 cm

Warning: This product contains small parts. Not suitable for children under 3 years - choking hazard.

fields.name: The Mega Edition Monopoly Board Game
fields.description:
Buy more property, buy more buildings and handle more cash in this Mega Edition of the family favourite Monopoly game.

The huge gameboard has 12 extra spaces, including eight new streets - one for every colour group. There are also skyscrapers you can add to your streets so your rents will rocket sky high, and if you build depots on your railway stations, you get double rent!

The extra M1000 note will help you pay for all this, and you'll get to race around the bigger board with the help of the Speed Die and Bus Tickets.

Includes: Game board, 8 x tokens, 1 banker's tray, 1 money pack, 32 houses, 12 hotels, 8 skyscrapers, 4 depots, 37 title deed cards, 16 chance cards, 16 community chest cards, 16 bus tickets, 2 regular dice, 1 speed die and instructions.

Product Information:
• Monopoly Board Game
• The Mega Edition
• Property-based strategy game
• 2-6 players
• Ages 8+

fields.name: Tactic Wanna Bet? Board Game
fields.description:
Up for a challenge? Wanna Bet’s the game to get!

Each player tries to solve both physical and puzzling tasks to win, while the other players bet on whether they can manage the task or not.

Includes: 
• Board
• 288 x Challenge cards
• 12 x Yes cards
• 12 x No cards
• Betting money
• 6 x Colourful playing pieces
• Notepad
• Die
• 3 x Sand timers

Who can do what? Can you find five blue things in the room? Carefully balance a spoon? Build a castle out of cards? Tasks can seem easy or hard! 

Friends and family might say they can do them... But d'ya Wanna Bet?!

Product Information:
• Tactic Wanna Bet?
• Board Game
• Players: 3-6
• Age: 8+
• Measures: ‎6.2 x 25 x 14 cm

fields.name: Christmas Market 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle
fields.description:
Have hours of fun piecing together this stunning Christmas Market image with 1000 high quality pieces.

This puzzle features a charming illustration of a snowy day at the Christmas Market in a gorgeous idyllic town. With a busy greengrocers and lots of children sledging in the street, this delightful jigsaw is sure to keep your mind endlessly intrigued.

Great for a spot of mental stimulation whilst providing hours of entertainment.

Product Information:
• Christmas Market
• Jigsaw Puzzle
• Brand: Corner Piece
• Pieces: 1000
• Measures: 68cm x 48cm when complete

fields.name: Disney Carnival 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle
fields.description:
Have hours of fun piecing together this fun classic Disney Carnival image. This picture perfect puzzle includes 1000 high quality pieces.

A delightful puzzle that is sure to boast a challenge for whoever takes it on, perfect to complete on your own or with friends and family.

Product Information:
• Disney Carnival
• Jigsaw Puzzle
• Brand: Ravensburger
• Pieces: 1000
• Measures: 70cm x 50cm

fields.name: Hill Top View 500 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle
fields.description:

A delightful puzzle that is sure to boast a challenge for whoever takes it on, perfect to complete on your own or with friends and family.

Product Information:
• Hill Top View
• Brand: Corner Piece
• Jigsaw Puzzle
• Pieces: 500
• Measures: 48cm x 34cm when complete

fields.name: Paw Patrol 2-in-1 60 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle Set
fields.description:
Enjoy piecing together the puzzles that feature some of your favourite Paw Patrol characters, with this fun 2-in-1 jigsaw puzzle set.

This puzzle set is the perfect way to teach youngsters problem solving, whilst having fun with their favourite characters.

Product Information:
• Jigsaw Puzzle Set
• Paw Patrol
• 2 x 60 piece puzzles 
• Brand: Clemetoni
• Ages: 3+
• Completed puzzles: 32  x 22 cm

fields.name: Blooming Paris 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle
fields.description:
Enjoy putting together the gorgeous 1000 piece jigsaw puzzle, featuring a Blooming Paris image.

Beautifully finished and extremely high quality, this puzzle is sure to provide hours of fun for you and your family.

Product Information:

• Blooming Paris
• Jigsaw Puzzle
• Brand: Corner Piece
• Pieces: 1000
• Measures: 68 cm x 48 cm
